value.title: Create a custom 4-4-5 calendar that self-generates in Power BI - Power BI Tips & Tricks 23
value.excerpt: A Power BI template to generate and self configure custom Power BI calendar.  In this video we will show you how to create (or download mine) a custom Power BI calendar that self configures and self generates with a little input from the user.  When a user opens the power BI file, s/he will be asked

value.title: Data densification in Power Query/ Power BI
value.excerpt: Data densification is basically a technique to densify the dataset or in simpler terms, increase the number of observations in the dataset.   If you want to learn how to do that in Power BI or Power Query, check this video!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: DAX fridays! #19: DIVIDE
value.excerpt: Let's go through DIVIDE() function available in DAX!  The DIVIDE function performs divisions and returns alternate result or BLANK() on division by 0.It is faster than the simple division operator.
